extendedInfo.description: Join us to Make your Own Colorful Giant Gummy from Scratch and Decorate it with our Amazing Fun Toppings !  Get Creative and Make More Than 1,000,000 Different Styles! Funny or Scary, It's Up to You! Features 3D HD Colorful Graphics! Free Lifetime Updates! 6 DIfferent Gummy Molds! 8 Different Flavors for Mode 1 (From Scratch)! 18 Different Flavors for Mode 2 (Instant Juice)! 27 Different Sticks to Choose From! 8 Different Sour Sparkles! 37 Different Colorful Sticks! 44 Different Colorful Candies! 46 Different Fun Items! Funny Eyes, Lips, Bows and Even Spiders! 52 Candy Letters! Just Write On Your Lollipops and Share it With Your Friends! Amazing Fun Music and Sound Effects! Unlimited Creative Play! The Fun Never Ends! Save to the Camera Roll! Sharing Option! (Facebook or Email!) Make a Greeting Card for Any Occasion and Send it it Your Friends!  How it works? From Scratch Start from scratch, mix all the ingredients, cut the fruits and make a tasty Giant Gummy! Available flavors for this mode are: Strawberry , Grape, Orange, Blueberry, Pineapple, Lime, Watermelon, Kiwi! Instant Juice! If you do not have enough time, you can make your gummy with " INSTANT JUICE"! You can choose from 18 different flavors and make a multi color gummy! Available flavors for "INSTANT JUICE" are: Strawberry , Grape, Orange, Cherry, Coconut, Blueberry, Lime, Watermelon, Raspberry, Caramel, and much more! 6 DIfferent Gummy Molds! Choose from classic Gummy Bear, Heart, Star, Octopus, Fish and Grapes! Lollipop Sticks! 37 Different Sticks to Choose From! All Colors and Stripes! Sour Sparkles! 8 Different Sour Sparkles! Do you Like Sour Gummies? They're So Fun To Apply! Candies! 44 Different Type of Candies! M&M's, Gummies, Mini Gummies, Sprinkles, Sour Gummies, and Much More! Fun Items! 46 DIfferent Eyes, Mouth, Lips and Bows are Available! Make a Pirate Lollipop! Or Make a Scorpion Lollipop! Candy Letters! 52 Candy Letters, Purple and Orange! Write Anything You Want on Your Lollipop! Eat it yourself, or Share it With Your Friends!
